START.DESC1: Investments can help to grow your savings beyond bank deposit rates.
START.DESC2: But you need to be able to ride out the ups and downs and stay invested to capture this higher return.
START.DESC3: In the following steps, we help you discover your Risk Profile – your ability and willingness to take risks – and recommend the most suitable portfolio for you.
START.PROMO_ERROR: Invalid promo code. Please try again.

META.META_TITLE: Online Investment | Invest With Whom You Can Trust | MoneyOwl
META.META_DESCRIPTION: Invest with MoneyOwl today! | Start from $50 RSP or $100 One Time | Dimensional Funds | Gain access to low-cost and globally diversified portfolio.

INVESTMENT.TITLE: Grow your wealth
INVESTMENT.DESC: Invest in our globally diversified portfolios to grow your wealth faster

SLIDES.P1: Our Investment Portfolios give you the best probability of a successful investment experience by helping you to achieve your financial goals.
SLIDES.P2: Let us choose the right asset allocation for you so that you can stay invested for the long haul with as little guesswork and as little stress as possible.
SLIDES.HEADING: What's great?

WISESAVER.TITLE: Park spare cash
WISESAVER.DESC: Get higher interest than your savings account with WiseSaver

SLIDES.P1: This is a cash management portfolio that gives you safe and stable returns that are comparable to SGD fixed deposits regardless of how much or how long you are saving.
SLIDES.P2: You can park your emergency funds or spare cash here with the confidence that you can easily access them whenever you need them.
SLIDES.HEADING: What's great?

WISEINCOME.TITLE: Receive passive income
WISEINCOME.DESC: Get regular payouts for your retirement or other needs with WiseIncome

SLIDES.P1: Invest in a portfolio of global indexed equities, Asian bonds, Singapore/US Government bonds and Singapore REITS designed to provide a stream of passive income for the long term.
SLIDES.P2: This is suitable for those who want to build passive income through their investments and can take moderate levels of risk.
SLIDES.HEADING: What's great?
SLIDES.LIST_ITEM_1: Passive income of 4.5% p.a. or higher (up to 4.8% p.a.)
SLIDES.LIST_ITEM_3: Portfolio of global equities, Asian bonds, S-REITS and govt bonds

WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.TITLE: WiseIncome Portfolio
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.CAPTION: Select a Payout Option
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.DESCRIPTION: Get regular payouts for your retirement or other needs with WiseIncome
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.NOTE_LBL: As your life stage change, your need for payouts may change as well. You can always change your payout option then.
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.PANEL_TITLE: Which WiseIncome payout option should I choose?
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.BALANCE_LBL: balance between income and leaving a legacy for loved ones
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.GRAPH_TITLE_LBL: Here’s a sample illustration of this payout option:
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.TAB_1_DESC_1:
Grow your investments at the projected long term expected returns in this multi-asset fund.

Any income paid out of the fund will be immediately reinvested through the purchase of new units in the fund.

The recommended investment holding period is at least 8 years. Early redemption from the fund could result in losses.
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.TAB_1_DESC_2:
Your investment portfolio would be $405,231 in 30 years.

This is based on $100,000 lumpsum (without monthly) investment at a projected rate of return of 6% p.a. (without payout), taking all fees into consideration.

Returns are only for illustrative purposes and all values shown above do not represent actual investment experience.
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.TAB_2_DESC_1:
Your payouts will be made out of income (coupons, dividends) and realised capital gains as much as possible though it may be possible that it can come from your investment capital.

The recommended investment holding period is at least 8 years. Early redemption from the fund could result in losses.
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.TAB_2_DESC_2:
In 30 years' time, you would have received $140,278 in total payouts and your projected portfolio value would be $105,437, bringing your total value to $245,716.

This is based on $100,000 lumpsum (without monthly) investment at a projected rate of return of 6% p.a., and a payout rate of 4.5%* p.a., taking all fees into consideration.

Returns are only for illustrative purposes and all values shown above do not represent actual investment experience.

*Fund manager has the discretion to vary the payout rate based on market conditions.
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.TAB_3_DESC_1:
Your payouts will be made out of income (coupons, dividends), realised capital gains and partially out of your capital.

The potential drawdown from your investment capital is expected to be higher compared to a lower payout rate.

The recommended investment holding period is at least 8 years. Early redemption from the fund could result in losses.
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.TAB_3_DESC_2:
In 30 years' time, you would have received $153,300 in total payouts and your projected portfolio value would be $36,611,bringing your total value to $189,911.

This is based on $100,000 lumpsum (without monthly) investment at a projected rate of return of 6% p.a., and a fixed payout rate of 8% p.a., taking all fees into consideration.

Returns are only for illustrative purposes and all values shown above do not represent actual investment experience.
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.FEATURE_BENEFITS_DESC_1:
Invest in a portfolio of global equities, Asian fixed income, US/SG govt bonds and Singapore REITs designed to provide a stream of passive income for the long term.

This is suitable for those who want to build passive income through their investments and can take moderate levels of risk.
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.WHATS_GREAT_PREFERENCE_LBL_1: Passive income of 4.5% p.a. or higher (up to 4.8% p.a.)
WISE_INCOME_PAYOUT.WHATS_GREAT_PREFERENCE_LBL_3: Portfolio of global equities, Asian bonds, S-REITS and govt bonds

FUNDING_METHOD.TITLE: Select Funding Method
FUNDING_METHOD.DESC: I want to fund this portfolio using
FUNDING_METHOD.HOW_TO_FUND_PORTFOLIO: How do you want to fund this portfolio?
FUNDING_METHOD.SRS_DESC: Please have your SRS account number ready before you continue from here. You <u>MUST</u> also ensure sufficient fund in your SRS Account. Amount will be deducted immediately to process the buy request.
FUNDING_METHOD.CASH_DESC: You can fund using any bank account (registered under your name).
FUNDING_METHOD.LOADER_DESC: Please wait while we load the data.

HELP_MODAL.TITLE: Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS)
HELP_MODAL.DESC1: The SRS is a voluntary savings scheme by the government to encourage people to save for their retirement. You can contribute annually to your SRS account up to a cap. These contributions are eligible for tax relief.
HELP_MODAL.DESC2: How do I set up a SRS account?
HELP_MODAL.DESC3: You can open a SRS account at any of the three local banks - DBS, OCBC and UOB online via their website. Monies in your SRS account earns an interest of only 0.05% p.a. so you should certainly look into investing these savings for better returns.
HELP_MODAL.DESC4: How to invest your SRS with MoneyOwl
HELP_MODAL.DESC5:
After you have set up your SRS account, simply select SRS as your source of funds when you create your investment portfolio. We will then deduct the funds from your SRS account to fund your investment.
Do take note that your investment returns are accumulated tax-free and only 50% of the withdrawals from SRS are taxable at retirement.
HELP_MODAL.DESC6: For assistance on updating your SRS account information, please email enquiries@moneyowl.com.sg.

GETSTARTED_STEP1.TITLE: Step 1
GETSTARTED_STEP1.CAPTION: Your Risk Ability
GETSTARTED_STEP1.DESCRIPTION: In the next step, we will assess your ability to take risk. Your inputs will determine the recommendations suggested.

PERSONAL_INFO.TITLE: Your Investment Period
PERSONAL_INFO.HOW_MANY_YEARS: For how many years do you want to stay invested?
PERSONAL_INFO.SELECT_INVESTMENT_DESC: Drag the slider to select the number of years you want to invest for this portfolio.
PERSONAL_INFO.NOTE: <u>Note:</u> Investment period is only used for portfolio recommendation. You can withdraw your investments anytime by selling the investments at the market price.
PERSONAL_INFO.TIME_HORIZON_DESC: Stock markets can be very volatile in the short term but go up in the long term. You can have more equities if you have a longer time for recovery from a decline.
PERSONAL_INFO.TIME_HORIZON_GUIDE: Here’s a guide on how investment period changes portfolio asset allocation.
PERSONAL_INFO.LIST_LBL_DESC_1:
Not suitable to invest.
Consider WiseSaver instead.
PERSONAL_INFO.TIME_HORIZON_ALERT: Our final recommendation will depend on your willingness to take risk and other factors.

It is not recommended to invest with only {{period}} of investment time horizon.

You may want to consider our WiseSaver Portfolio instead.

MY_FINANCIALS.MY_FINANCIALS_LBL_DESC: In accordance with MAS Guidelines, help us understand your financial situation better to ensure that the recommended investment is suitable for you.
MY_FINANCIALS.MY_FINANCIAL_LBL: How much do you own and owe?

modalData.modalMessage: Before you invest, we recommend that you have an emergency fund to cover at least 3 months’ of living expenses.

helpData.modalDesc: Emergency Fund is money that must be set aside to cover your living expenses for a period of at least 3 months. In the event of an emergency, such as a loss of income, the emergency fund helps cover some of your expenses.

MY_FINANCIALS.QUESTATION: Do you have at least 3 months’ worth of Emergency Fund?

PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.USER_INPUT_SUB_TEXT: Almost there, here’s your projected portfolio value for {{ onetime }} one-time amount & {{ monthly }} monthly amount for {{ period }} years.
PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.FAQ_DESC_TEXT: For more information, visit our FAQs.
PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.REVIEW_SUB_TEXT: Review your inputs or proceed to start investing in this portfolio.
PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.INVESTMENT_FUND_CONDITION: Please note that your investment only starts after you have created and funded your account.
PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.PORTFOLIO_PROJECTION_SUBTEXT: Your investment returns may vary. The projected portfolio value ranges between {{ worst }} to {{ best }}. The average projected portfolio value is {{ median }}.
PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.GRAPH_SUB_TEXT: The graph shows the best, median and worst return that can be achieved 75% of the time over your investment period. The median projected return (net of all fees) is {{investedPercentage}}. All projections are net of all fees (based on standard rate of 0.6% p.a). You may be enjoying a lower advisory fee, which means projected values would be higher than shown.
PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.TITLE: Your Portfolio Details
PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.EXPENSIVE_RATIO: Enjoy 0% fees for the 1st $10,000 until end of 2021. Fees include fund level fee of {{expensiveRatio}} p.a. which is incorporated into the NAV. View our fees table.
PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.EXPENSIVE_RATIO_WISE_INCOME: This excludes fund level fees (such as annual management fees of {{expensiveRatio}} p.a.) which are factored into the price of the fund. View our fees table.

WISE_SAVER_PORTOFOLIO.TITLE_DESC: The underlying cash fund holds assets primarily in Singapore Dollar deposits.
WISE_SAVER_PORTOFOLIO.RATE_DESC:
This rate will be updated periodically as
market and economic conditions change.
WISE_SAVER_PORTOFOLIO.PORTFOLIO_DESC: This is based on the weighted average gross yield of the underlying deposits placed with the counterparty financial institution which has a minimum short- term rating of F2 by Fitch, P-2 by Moody’s, or A-2 by S&P.

PORTFOLIO_RECOMMENDATION.MODAL_DESC: In the next step, we will be showing you the recommended portfolio that is most suited to your profile.

helpDate.modalMessage: This is an estimated percentage of gains that the portfolio will achieve. Do note that it is not guaranteed and the actual returns will depend on the actual performance of each asset.

editModel.modalMessage: To make changes to your portfolio, you need to reassess your risk. Are you sure you want to continue?

ERRORS.ATLEAST_ONE_SHOULD_INVEST: Either you have to fund One-time amount or Monthly amount.

WISE_INCOME_PORTFOLIO.DESC_LBL: The fund invest in the following asset classes in this proportions.
WISE_INCOME_PORTFOLIO.EQUITIES_DESC: The equities component of the portfolio will seek to give investors exposure to companies and ETFs that are listed on recognised stock exchanges globally. The passive investing strategy adopted, coupled with broad diversification of the underlying ETFs allows investors to reap market-based returns without having to rely on guesswork.
WISE_INCOME_PORTFOLIO.SREITS_DESC: The portfolio invest in Singapore REITs that are underpinned by dividend sustainability coupled with potential growth. The fund manager will consider a myriad of factors such as underlying asset quality, governance, strength of management team to determine the sustainability of the dividend. From the growth aspect, the fund manager will consider the REIT’s potential for accretive acquisitions as well as underlying sector or asset trends . The REITs invested would typically be about SGD$1bn market cap or larger with daily trading value of SGD1mill or more.
WISE_INCOME_PORTFOLIO.FIXED_INCOME_DESC: The fixed income securities may be investment grade, non-investment grade and/or unrated securities primarily issued by companies, governments, quasi-governments, government agencies or supranationals, with primary focus in Asian companies. Foreign currency denominated fixed income securities will generally be hedged to SGD to reduce the exposure of the securities to the movement of foreign currencies and the overall credit rating of the fixed income portfolio will be BBB- (S&P) and above.
WISE_INCOME_PORTFOLIO.DISCLAIMER_LBL: Click on link below for factsheet and product highlights sheet.
